description: Locations of buildings participating in the Cool Roofs initiative.  NYC Cool Roofs buildings have a reflective surface applied to their rooftop, helping to reduce cooling costs, cut energy usage and lower greenhouse gas emissions.

name: NYC Cool Roofs Buildings
